title: Kennie Chopart
text: Kennie Knak Chopart (born 1 June 1990) is a <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> professional <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who plays in the <a href="%C3%9Arvalsdeild">Úrvalsdeild</a> for <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lag%20Reykjav%C3%ADkur">Knattspyrnufélag Reykjavíkur</a>. Having previously played for rival <a href="Reykjav%C3%ADk">Reykjavík</a> side <a href="Ungmennaf%C3%A9lagi%C3%B0%20Fj%C3%B6lnir">Ungmennafélagið Fjölnir</a>, he transferred to KR Reykjavik in 2016. In July 2016, he scored two goals in a <a href="Europa%20League">Europa League</a> qualifying game against <a href="Glenavon">Glenavon</a>
